content:
bjorn3 commented on issue #135:

This was about the polyfill at https://wasi.dev/polyfill/index.html, right? It is now gone.

jameysharp closed issue #135:

How to use polyfill.js in webpack entry file such that the modules function defined in the polyfill can be found my subsequent wasm?

Here is my sample entry file.
https://gist.github.com/alanpoon/0da16e04fbccf29c0846c8c32324c622
